title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 335.24 - Professional obligation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 335.24 - Professional obligation

State Regulations

The professional obligation of an employee, consistent
with the employee's academic rank or professional title, shall include
teaching, research, university service and other duties and responsibilities
required of the employee during the term of the employee's professional
obligation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
335.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
